biography.bio: Paul Hagen was one the most famous Danish actors after the Second World War. He was born on 19th of March 1920 in Copenhagen. His father was painter named Åge Falck Rasmussen, his mother was an opera singer named Anna Hagen. Hagen was accepted into Frederiksberg's theatre school in 1944. He finished his education as an actor in 1945. He had his debut as an actor in 1944 in the play "Livet er jo dejligt" on "Riddersalen" in Copenhagen. He then worked at Aarhus theatre (until 1951). In 1953 he got famous for a song he made for "Fiffer Revyen". The song where entitled: "Lille Lise let-på-tråd". He worked in various theatres throughout the 50s, 60s, 70s, 80s and 90s. He finally said goodbye to theatre in 1998. Hagen had his debut in film in 1952, with the film: "Kærlighedsdoktoren". Hagen subsequently worked in 118 movies, plus TV series. In 1961 he worked with Preben Kaas, in "To skøre ho'der", were both of them wrote, produced, directed and acted in. In movies he frequently played a friend of the hero or a bright sidekick. Hagen had much success in the Danish film-series: "Støver-filmene", "Soldaterkammerater-filmene" and "Sengekants-filmene". Other notable appearances in film are: Bussen (1963), Hvis lille pige er du? (1963), Martha (1967), Ballade på Christianshavn (1971), Olsen-banden på sporet (1975) and Walter og Carlo - op på fars hat (1985). He married twice; first time with actress Asta Esper Hagen Andersen, with whom he had a son - Esper Hagen, who later also became an actor. He later married a woman named Alice Martens. On TV Hagen got very famous, throughout Denmark, with his role as the animal shop-clerk Clausen, in the very famous Danish TV series "Huset på Christianshavn" (1970). Hagen also acted in "Krummernes Jul" (1996). He died on the 20th of May 2003 and is buried in the cemetery: Langø Kirkegård, on Lolland.
biography.name: Paul Hagen

biography.bio: Louis Miehe-Renard was born on April 11, 1919 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Adam og Eva (1953), Soldaterkammerater (1958) and Nu stiger den (1966). He was married to Caja Heimann. He died on January 21, 1997 in Denmark.
biography.name: Louis Miehe-Renard

biography.bio: Danish actor Ebbe Langberg was the son of actor Sigurd Langberg and actress Karna Loewenstein-Jensen. He started his carrier as a child actor in the theater, and later had his first film debut in the movie "Ditte menneskebarn" in 1946. He studied theater in London from 1950-1951, and continued his studies at Odense Theatre in Denmark from 1951-1953. He failed to get accepted at the Danish Royal Theatre twice. After finishing his studies in Odense, he moved to Copenhagen with some friends. In the 1940's and 50's he stared in more than 40 movies and quickly became the female audiences favorite hero. We often saw him opposite the danish actress Ghita Noereby. He later stepped behind the screen to become Director and Stagedirector on several movies. From January 1968 to October 1973 he became theater director for Aalborg Theatre. And spend one season as theater director for the Danish Theatre from 1973-1974. In 1982 he opened the Rialto Theatre, which he ran till he died in 1989.
biography.name: Ebbe Langberg

biography.bio: Preben Kaas was born on March 30, 1930 in Aalborg, Denmark. He was an actor and writer, known for Martha (1967), Where Is the Body, Moeller? (1971) and Two Crazy Guys (1961). He was married to Lisbet Dahl, Anne Mari Lie, Ulla Larsen and Bodil Nymark Nielsen. He died on March 27, 1981 in Denmark.
biography.name: Preben Kaas

biography.bio: Klaus Pagh was born on July 29, 1935 in Denmark. He is an actor and producer, known for Mig og mafiaen (1973), Kira's Reason: A Love Story (2001) and Girls at Arms 2 (1976).
biography.name: Klaus Pagh

biography.bio: Ole Dixon was born on October 11, 1935 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Soldaterkammerater (1958), Soldaterkammerater rykker ud (1959) and Operation Camel (1960). He died on July 8, 1975 in Denmark.
biography.name: Ole Dixon

biography.bio: Svend Johansen was born on May 17, 1930. He is an actor and producer, known for Angel of the Night (1998), Flies on the Wall (2005) and The Ways of Women (1970).
biography.name: Svend Johansen

biography.bio: Carl Ottosen was born on July 18, 1918 in Denmark. He was an actor and writer, known for Soldaterkammerater på sjov (1962), Journey to the Seventh Planet (1962) and Hunger (1966). He died on January 8, 1972 in Denmark.
biography.name: Carl Ottosen

biography.bio: Henrik Wiehe was born on February 9, 1927 in Frederiksberg, Denmark as Henrik Rosing Wiehe. He was an actor, known for Blændværk (1955), Det støver stadig (1962) and Baronessen fra benzintanken (1960). He was married to Lene Vasegaard and Lene Vasegaard. He died on July 1, 1987 in Frederiksberg.
biography.name: Henrik Wiehe

biography.bio: Emil Hass Christensen was born on January 23, 1903 in Frederiksberg, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Englen i sort (1957), Fem mand og Rosa (1964) and Drømmen om det hvide slot (1962). He was married to Hjørdis Gunnlögsson. He died on January 12, 1982 in Denmark.
biography.name: Emil Hass Christensen

biography.bio: Sigrid Horne-Rasmussen was born on September 22, 1915 in Hellerup, Denmark. She was an actress, known for Altid ballade (1955), Ces sacrés gosses (1947) and Krudt og klunker (1958). She was married to Dirch Passer. She died on April 24, 1982 in Denmark.
biography.name: Sigrid Horne-Rasmussen

biography.bio: Vera Stricker was born on July 4, 1935 in Frederiksberg, Denmark. She was an actress, known for Night Girls (1957), Eventyrrejsen (1960) and Ung kærlighed (1958). She was married to Steffen Lautrup. She died on September 16, 1960.
biography.name: Vera Stricker

biography.bio: Annie Birgit Garde was born on October 3, 1933 in Frederikssund, Denmark as Annie Birgit Hansen. She is an actress, known for Bedroom Mazurka (1970), Jeg elsker dig (1957) and Charles' Aunt (1959).
biography.name: Annie Birgit Garde

biography.bio: Judy Gringer was born on January 23, 1941 in Denmark. She is an actress, known for The Factory Outing (1978), Majorens oppasser (1964) and In the Middle of the Night (1984).
biography.name: Judy Gringer

biography.bio: Arne Honoré is an actor, known for Soldaterkammerater (1958).
biography.name: Arne Honoré
